hotels.title: Brand-New Sophisticated Park City Ski-In, Ski-Out Escape
hotels.description: Ensconced in the breathtaking Rocky Mountains, only a one-minute glide from the nearest ski lift, the brand-new Pendry Park City offers exclusive ski-in, ski-out sophistication backed by world-class service. After a day on Utah's celebrated slopes, there’s après-ski entertainment in abundance - savour live music and fireside cocktails at Après Pendry, indulge in wagyu and omakase at KITA restaurant, or head to Spa Pendry for signature treatments and soothing repose.
